name: Najeela, the Blade-Blossom
oracle_text:
Whenever a Warrior attacks, you may have its controller create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Untap all attacking creatures. They gain trample, lifelink, and haste until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Activate only during combat.

name: Parallel Lives
oracle_text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

name: Hex
oracle_text: Destroy six target creatures.

name: Tangle
oracle_text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Heroic Intervention
oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

name: Arasta of the Endless Web
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

name: Savage Beating
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during combat on your turn.

• Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

Entwine {1}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

name: Chaos Warp
oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

name: Reprieve
oracle_text:
Return target spell to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

name: Lord of Atlantis
oracle_text: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

name: Thrill of Possibility
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

name: Unexpected Windfall
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Rite of Replication
oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

name: Path to Exile
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Reanimate
oracle_text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

name: Heroic Intervention
oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

name: Rest in Peace
oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

name: Nine Lives
oracle_text:
Hexproof
If a source would deal damage to you, prevent that damage and put an incarnation counter on this enchantment.
When there are nine or more incarnation counters on this enchantment, exile it.
When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

name: Alibou, Ancient Witness
oracle_text:
Other artifact creatures you control have haste.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, Alibou deals X damage to any target and you scry X, where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.
printed_text:
Other artifact creatures you control have haste.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, Iron Spider deals X damage to any target and you scry X, where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.

oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

name: Terminate
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Hunter's Insight

oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, if it was cast, target opponent creates a token that's a copy of it.

Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring gains life during their turn, you gain that much life.

oracle_text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

Flash
You control your opponents while they're searching their libraries.

oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures you control.

name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
oracle_text: Whenever Lorthos attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
printed_text: Whenever Doc Ock attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

name: Comeuppance
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage from a creature source is prevented this way, Comeuppance deals that much damage to that creature. If damage from a noncreature source is prevented this way, Comeuppance deals that much damage to the source's controller.

name: Dauthi Voidwalker
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, instead exile it with a void counter on it.
{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Choose an exiled card an opponent owns with a void counter on it. You may play it this turn without paying its mana cost.

name: Saw in Half
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their power is half that creature's power and their toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.
artist: John Romita Jr. & John Romita Sr.

name: Extinction Event
oracle_text: Choose odd or even. Exile each creature with mana value of the chosen quality. (Zero is even.)
